title: Stop trying to pick melee champions in lane
body:
You're just trolling tbh

Mages are better than assassins

Jayce/Kennen shit on all melees

ADCs still dominating bot after 6 seasons

Just go jungle








Oh wait nvm Nidalee Elise Graves

Guess you can play Twisted Treeline

replies.body:
I have a 68% win rate with skarner in ranked, and I play waaay more normals. 
But I understand your frustration, mid and top will be dominated by ranged champions, but I've had really good success when I play mordekaiser/leona botlane with my friend. By success I mean we don't let the enemy adc/support even farm.
it is my god given right to choose to lose
lol even the TT players are figuring out to play ranged :wearyface:
And can we call adc ranged? Please, I play sup most of the time, and I would say having a mellee champ in adc spot is a loss 90% of the time. Thank you.

Poppy, Gragas, Leona, Kled, Mordekaiser, Trundle, Fiora, Pantheon, Skarner, Braum, Naut, Blitz, Ekko, Kassadin, Nocturne, and Voli laugh at your statement and hope you keep believing that while they crush your team.
